short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YapThread Browser Extension - Record, Bookmark, AI Chat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YapThread allows you to record, bookmark, and chat with anything!

Save your links, tweets, bookmarks, and anything else from across the internet and chat with it using YapThread
